entry.tran: （对死者表示尊敬和哀悼的）降半旗
entry.def: If a flag is flying at half-mast, it is flying from the middle of the pole, not the top, to show respect and sorrow for someone who has just died.

example.ex: Flags have been flying at half-mast, and schools, offices and businesses have been closed.
example.tran: 降了半旗，学校、办公楼和商业场所也都关门了。

means.word_mean: 1. a position some distance below the top of the mast to which a flag is lowered in mourning or to signal distress
